task.name: Adversarial Review
task.objective: Skeptically review content and produce actionable findings

llm.i: Be skeptical and focus on what is missing
Find at least ten issues or improvements when possible

step.title: Receive Content
step.action: If empty, ask for clarification and abort

step.title: Adversarial Analysis
step.action: List concrete issues: correctness, security, performance, maintainability, missing tests

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: Output findings as a Markdown list
